message:
Fix small UI style bugs (#15)

* Fix broken paths to config vars

* Add sticky footer

* Add navbar

* Cut `Currently tracking` list on `<Home />`

Avoid redundant game listings.

* Fix style bug on `<Game />` subcomponent

`<Game />` should center on small screens.

* Fix style bug on `<GameDetails />`

`<Description />` should fill entire row on small screens.

* Cut unused vars

* Cut incompatible assertions

Manual acceptance test successful. Long term fix in #14.

Refactor components (#13)

* Cut `build` folder

Will be replaced in automated build via Travis-CI.

* Refactor file/folder hierarchy: `<Main />` and subcomponents

* Refactor file/folder hierarchy

Grouping sub/components by page.

* Bump client-side dev/dependencies to current

Migrating app to react-router-dom v4. Refactoring `<App />` and subcomponents to accommodate.

* Fix depricated reactstrap component

* Fix broken feature: `browserHistory.push()`

Replacing with `store.dispatch(push())`.

* Fix broken reactstrap component `<Dropdown />`

* Fix broken path to client-side app

Broke when I changed folder from `client` to `frontend`.

* Refactor file/folder hierarchy for client functions

All frontend clients (MongoDB, Sony PS Store, YouTube).

* Add only display confirm/reset after blacklist check

Improve UX.

* Cut `react-lazy-load` add `react-lazyload`

Smoother performance. Implementing via new helper component.

* Cut temp `./client/build` folder

Shouldn't be tracked by Git.

* Add font awesome script

Also adding more descriptive site title.

* Refactor `<SubmiteGameForm />` `<TitleSearch />`

Refactored and file retitled.

* Refactor `<AutoSuggestions />`

* Refactor `<SearchResults />`

Single CSS rule. Moved inline.

* Refactor `<Games />` and subcomponents

Created `<ListOfPlatforms />` as new helper.

* Refactor `<PriceAlert />` and subcomponents

Slight change to props.errors to enable invalid gameId err handling.

* Refactor `<Unsubscribe />` to update new filenames

Refactor client-side (#12)

* Cut `build` folder

Will be replaced in automated build via Travis-CI.

* Refactor file/folder hierarchy: `<Main />` and subcomponents

* Refactor file/folder hierarchy

Grouping sub/components by page.

* Bump client-side dev/dependencies to current

Migrating app to react-router-dom v4. Refactoring `<App />` and subcomponents to accommodate.

* Fix depricated reactstrap component

* Fix broken feature: `browserHistory.push()`

Replacing with `store.dispatch(push())`.

* Fix broken reactstrap component `<Dropdown />`

* Fix broken path to client-side app

Broke when I changed folder from `client` to `frontend`.

* Refactor file/folder hierarchy for client functions

All frontend clients (MongoDB, Sony PS Store, YouTube).

* Add only display confirm/reset after blacklist check

Improve UX.
